org.ksoap2.transport

Class KeepAliveHttpsTransportSE

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ksoap2.transport.Transport
      • org.ksoap2.transport.HttpTransportSE
        • org.ksoap2.transport.HttpsTransportSE
          • org.ksoap2.transport.KeepAliveHttpsTransportSE

  • public class KeepAliveHttpsTransportSE
extends HttpsTransportSE
    KeepAliveHttpsTransport deals with the problems with the Android ssl libraries having trouble with certificates and certificate authorities somehow messing up connecting/needing reconnects. Added as generic class for SE since it might be useful in SE environments as well and can be used as an example to create your own transport implementations.
    Author:
    Manfred Moser
    See Also:
    "http://groups.google.com/group/android-developers/browse_thread/thread/3dcf62e7886a213/21f912bb90a011d6", "http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=7074", "http://crazybob.org/2010_02_01_crazyboblee_archive.html"

    • Method Detail

      • getServiceConnection

        public ServiceConnection getServiceConnection()
                                       throws IOException
        Get a service connection. Returns an implementation of ServiceConnectionSE that ignores "Connection: close" request property setting and has "Connection: keep-alive" always set and is uses a https connection.
        Overrides:
        getServiceConnection in class HttpsTransportSE
        Throws:
        IOException
        See Also:
        HttpTransportSE.getServiceConnection()
